verses.verse: To the chief Musician,<WH5329> A Psalm<WH4210> for the sons<WH1121> of Korah.<WH7141> LORD,<WH3068> thou hast been favorable<WH7521> unto thy land:<WH776> thou hast brought back<WH7725> the captivity<WH7622> of Jacob.<WH3290>
Thou hast forgiven<WH5375> the iniquity<WH5771> of thy people,<WH5971> thou hast covered<WH3680> all<WH3605> their sin.<WH2403> Selah.<WH5542>
Thou hast taken away<WH622> all<WH3605> thy wrath:<WH5678> thou hast turned<WH7725> thyself from the fierceness<WH4480> <WH2740> of thine anger.<WH639>
Turn <WH7725> us, O God<WH430> of our salvation,<WH3468> and cause thine anger<WH3708> toward<WH5973> us to cease.<WH6565>
Wilt thou be angry<WH599> with us forever?<WH5769> wilt thou draw out<WH4900> thine anger<WH639> to all generations?<WH1755> <WH1755>
Wilt thou<WH859> not<WH3808> revive<WH2421> us again:<WH7725> that thy people<WH5971> may rejoice<WH8055> in thee?
Show <WH7200> us thy mercy,<WH2617> O LORD,<WH3068> and grant<WH5414> us thy salvation.<WH3468>

I will hear<WH8085> what<WH4100> God<WH410> the LORD<WH3068> will speak:<WH1696> for<WH3588> he will speak<WH1696> peace<WH7965> unto<WH413> his people,<WH5971> and to<WH413> his saints:<WH2623> but let them not<WH408> turn again<WH7725> to folly.<WH3690>
Surely <WH389> his salvation<WH3468> is nigh<WH7138> them that fear<WH3373> him; that glory<WH3519> may dwell<WH7931> in our land.<WH776>
Mercy <WH2617> and truth<WH571> are met together;<WH6298> righteousness<WH6664> and peace<WH7965> have kissed<WH5401> each other.
Truth <WH571> shall spring<WH6779> out of the earth;<WH4480> <WH776> and righteousness<WH6664> shall look down<WH8259> from heaven.<WH4480> <WH8064>
Yea, <WH1571> the LORD<WH3068> shall give<WH5414> that which is good;<WH2896> and our land<WH776> shall yield<WH5414> her increase.<WH2981>
Righteousness <WH6664> shall go<WH1980> before<WH6440> him; and shall set<WH7760> us in the way<WH1870> of his steps.<WH6471>
